cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: If you are planning to migrate a website to Xperience by Kentico as part of a new project or consolidation of other products into a single solution you should add Kentico MVP Dmitry Bastron's post to the top of your list. Dmitry takes a high level, strategic perspective on the topic making it valuable for all audiences. Having worked on Kentico's Sitecore Migration Tool he definitely knows what he's talking about.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Your last migration to Xperience by Kentico
